text: David Wright is an American professional baseball player. He plays on the New York Mets of Major League Baseball. He plays third base. He wears number 5. Wright was born on December 20, 1982 in Norfolk, Virginia. He was drafted by the Mets in the 2001 draft. He started playing in the minor leagues later that year. Wright first played for the Mets in July 2004. Since that time, he has been the Mets regular third basemen. He has been in 7 all-star games. Wright was chosen as captain of the Mets in 2013 ==Other websites== * David Wright MLB Blog * David Wright at the Ultimate Mets Database * Yahoo MLB Profile * Category:New York Mets players Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Norfolk, Virginia
title: David Wright (baseball)
